turns.speaker: client
turns.text: I'd like to order a drink from Starbucks please.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: Sure, which Starbuck's location is best for you?

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: The Starbucks on Golden Springs drive near Grand Ave in Diamond Bar.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: Great, what can I order for you?

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: I'd like to order a white chocolate mocha please.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: Sure, what size would you like?

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: Venti, please.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: Would you like any addons?

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: I'd actually like an extra shot of espresso.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: Sure, any other specific requests?

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: Actually, I'd also like them to use whole milk and to add whipped cream on top.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: The addition of whipped cream and an extra shot of espresso adds $1.50 to your order. Is that all right?

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: Yes, that's fine.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: Your total for your drink order comes out to $7.15.

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: Great, do I just pick it up at the counter?

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: Yes, you will be able to pick it up from the designated mobile pickup area.

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: Thank you very much.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: To confirm, you ordered a venti, white chocolate mocha with an extra shot of espresso and whipped cream.

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: Yes, that is correct.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: Your order has been placed and the receipt has been sent to your phone by text. Please show your receipt at the counter when picking up.

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: Thank you very much!
